channel.title: Love's Intro
channel.description:
Well i know I am not a new member here, but I never really got into introducing myself and that was somewhat rude of me I suppose.
My name is Allison, i am a male though. ( go ahead and laugh I am used to it lol), my history with rsps go back about two years. I started to play rsps's after Jagex messed with Fist of Guthix so much which ruined a "fog pro clan" my friend mcnublet and i ran.
I enjoy forum chatting and skilling a lot as hobbies. I work as an assistant director at a childcare center in my town.
Hope to get to know the community more, again I do apologize for never introducing myself I guess when I learned that you could make your own and play your own it kind of overwhelmed me. xD.

item.title: Love's Intro
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

^You can trust Vain with your life - don’t let the 10 reputation fool you.

[quote=“Chassy13, post:11, topic:390104”]Don’t worry, casey. and I both get called girls often for our forum names.

Welcome to MoparScape.[/quote]
LOL and all this time I thought you were both gi-… boys?

@Love, Welcome. I thought you was going to get told off for posting a welcome thread but apparently not. Goodbye threads are not allowed.

Just remember, never be afraid to speak out and try your best to ignore the flame-baiting. It’s not all that bad here. We’re a tight-knit community I think.

Read full topic

Well i know I am not a new member here, but I never really got into introducing myself and that was somewhat rude of me I suppose.

My name is Allison, i am a male though. ( go ahead and laugh I am used to it lol), my history with rsps go back about two years. I started to play rsps’s after Jagex messed with Fist of Guthix so much which ruined a “fog pro clan” my friend mcnublet and i ran.

I enjoy forum chatting and skilling a lot as hobbies. I work as an assistant director at a childcare center in my town.

Hope to get to know the community more, again I do apologize for never introducing myself I guess when I learned that you could make your own and play your own it kind of overwhelmed me. xD.
